title: Rainbow pickle
description: This crunchy pickle is an ideal way of preserving all sorts of seasonal vegetables from your allotment.
serves: Makes 2 x 500ml/18fl oz jars of pickle
ingredients: 4 baby cucumbers, trimmed, cut into batons
3 Apache or red chillies, seeds and inner membranes removed, thinly sliced
1 garlic bulb, cloves separated and peeled
